There is also public parking along the adjacent public streets in the residential neighborhood surrounding our community. No permits are required for residents or visitors. Local laws apply with the typical restrictions for fire lanes and handicapped spaces.

Description: Kaywood Gardens in historic Mt. Rainier, MD offer spacious studio, 1 and 2 bedroom apartments. Great Eastern Avenue location on the Washington, DC border. We’re at the center of everything you need. Public transit is at your doorstep – MetroBus F1, F2 and G8 stop here and a 5-10 minute walk to many other buses. 5-7 minutes to W. Hyattsville and Brookland/CUA MetroRail stations. 10 minutes to Route 50 or BW Parkway, 15 minutes to I-495/95. 5-10 minutes to everyday shopping and services, grocery stores, and more. Just 5 minutes to the Gateway Arts District. 10 minutes to Howard University, Catholic University, University of Maryland, Colmar Manor Park and The National Arboretum. Many apartments include a big and bright living area, separate dining area, large kitchen with space for a café table, linen and coat closets, and blinds provided throughout. Efficient electronic heating/cooling system (hotel-style, not window units). Gas for cooking and for heating water is included in your rent – you pay electricity and water/sewer. Cats are welcome. Property features include a cardio-exercise room, central laundry facility, miles of sidewalks, mailboxes inside each building, a relaxed park-like setting, on-site management office and 24-hour emergency maintenance. For more information and availability, visit www.kaywoodgardens.com.

Description: Queenstown Apartments are your opportunity to live steps from everything Mount Rainier, College Park and Washington DC have to offer! Conveniently located close to the West Hyattsville Green Line Metro Station and The Queens Chapel Bus Lines, Queenstown Apartments cuts your commute and keeps all of Maryland at your fingertips. Enjoy a city lifestyle, close to shopping, dining and entertainment with all of the comfort of a suburban setting. See why calling Queenstown Apartments home is the perfect choice for you!

Description: NOW OPEN!!! ACCEPTING APPLICATIONS! LIMITED NUMBER OF HOMES LEFT! Live in the newest community in Prince George's County for households with at least one member over 62! Amenities include greenhouse, beauty salon, picnic area and more. This smoke-free and pet friendly community features one and two bedroom apartments with fully-equipped modern kitchens. Inquire today! Located in Mount Rainier, Maryland, Rainier Manor is a thriving senior community! With newly renovated apartments, this community offers an affordable rental choice to seniors age 62 and over. If you’re an outdoor lover, you’ll enjoy the handsomely landscaped grounds with walking paths, picnic areas perfect for the pet-friendly community. The Metro bus service is just outside your door and the West Hyattsville Metro rail is within walking distance, along with banks, shops, houses of worship, restaurants, and more. For your convenience, our smoke-free community offers a laundry facility, easily accessible elevator, and resident lounges on every floor. Our beautiful multi-purpose entertainment room will have you socializing with new friends in no time. Every affordable one or two bedroom apartment at Rainier Manor includes a fully-equipped kitchen with electric appliances, energy-efficient thermopane windows, wall-to-wall carpeting, individually controlled heating and air conditioning, and optional cable TV hookups. Apartments are equipped with an emergency pull-cord system, which is located in all bedrooms and bathrooms; the community has a remote card entry system and 24-hour emergency maintenance. All of these services are in place for your peace of mind. Best of all, we’re where you want to be…close to everything, including perfection.

Description:
Note: Rental for basement unit - not the whole house. 
Not your parent's basement. You'll love this spacious, newly finished basement 1 BR+ apartment. Contemporary kitchen with warm wood cabinets, stainless steel appliances and granite counters. From the kitchen open the french doors to the living room with ample sitting area. Down the hall is the bath with its large shower with built-in seating and bedroom with dual closets. Private side entrance. Share laundry room with Owner. Utilities included. Pets case by case. Finishing touches in progress. 
Newly completed basement apartment with side private entrance. Located in lively Mount Rainier with its vibrant art district, locally owned restaurants including vegan dining, local food co-op, multiple parks and trails. Adjacent to Washington DC providing for easy commuting options.

Description: Enjoy tranquility at home with all the benefits of urban living just moments away at Queens Manor Gardens Apartments. Centrally located in Hyattsville, MD, in the city of Mount Rainier, Queens Manor Gardens Apartments are comfortably situated just minutes from West Hyattsville Metro, Prince George's Plaza, and Washington, DC. This garden style apartment community is comprised of newly updated homes combining classic architectural style with modern comfort and convenience. Each affordable one, two, and three bedroom apartment home features a newly remodeled kitchen with a large, sunny window, a formal dining area, and individually controlled heating and air conditioning. As a resident of Queens Manor Gardens, you'll enjoy quiet living in a wonderful park-like setting with an array of shopping and dining options, schools, and DC's many museums and attractions nearby. With easy access to the Capital Beltway and public bus service available at your doorstep, every convenience is within your reach.
